site.name: Golden Years Pet Sanctuary
site.title: Caring for Senior Pets with Love and Dignity
site.description: A sanctuary dedicated to providing loving care for senior pets in their golden years. Adoption, hospice care, and lifetime sanctuary services.

organization.name: Golden Years Pet Sanctuary
organization.mission: To provide compassionate care, comfort, and dignity to senior pets while helping them find loving homes or peaceful sanctuary for their remaining years.

hero.title: Every Senior Pet Deserves Love
hero.subtitle: Providing compassionate care and finding loving homes for pets in their golden years
hero.description: At Golden Years Pet Sanctuary, we believe that age is just a number. Our senior pets have so much love to give and deserve to spend their remaining years in comfort, dignity, and happiness.

items.title: Senior Pet Adoption
items.description: Find your perfect senior companion. Older pets make wonderful, grateful companions.

items.title: Lifetime Sanctuary Care
items.description: For pets who need specialized care or peaceful retirement in a loving environment.

items.title: Hospice & Palliative Care
items.description: Compassionate end-of-life care ensuring comfort and dignity for our most vulnerable pets.

items.title: Senior Pet Support
items.description: Resources and support for families caring for aging pets at home.

about.title: Why Choose Senior Pets?
about.description: Senior pets are often overlooked, but they make incredible companions. They're calm, grateful, and ready to love unconditionally. At Golden Years, we specialize in caring for pets aged 7 and older, providing them with medical care, comfort, and the chance to find loving homes.

reviews.name: Sarah Johnson
reviews.review: Adopting our 11-year-old dog Charlie from Golden Years was the best decision we ever made. He's brought so much joy and wisdom to our family. The staff prepared us perfectly for senior pet care.

reviews.name: Michael Chen
reviews.review: When our family cat needed end-of-life care, Golden Years provided compassionate hospice services. They helped us give Mittens a peaceful, dignified goodbye surrounded by love.

reviews.name: Linda Rodriguez
reviews.review: I volunteer at Golden Years and am amazed by their dedication to senior pets. Every animal receives individualized care, medical attention, and so much love. It's truly special.

footer.description: Golden Years Pet Sanctuary is dedicated to providing loving care for senior pets. Every donation helps us continue our mission of giving older pets the dignity and comfort they deserve.
